posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment

posts.title: First Post Test
posts.text: blog with hexoThis is the first blog with hexo(정적 블로그 프레임워크) Install and Test설치1npm install -g hexo-cli 초기화123hexo init blogcd blognpm install 포스트 생성123hexo new {post-name}# orhexo n {post-name} /source/_post/post-name.md 가 생성됨 확인123hexo server# orhexo s 정적 페이지 생성12hexo generatehexo g /blog/public/에 실제 서버에 올라갈 웹 페이지 생성변경점이 제대로 적용되지 않을 경우 hexo clean 후 hexo generate Deploy1npm i hexo-deployer-git --save ./_config.yml에 GitHub 계정 입력 12345678#URLurl: https://{github_id}.github.io/{repository}root: /{repository}/# Deploymentdeploy: type: git repo: https://github.com/{github_id}/{repository} branch: gh-pages
